description: This Java class `Event` represents an event in the system. It includes methods for creating an event with a specific type, generating a timestamp, and sending the event as a UDP datagram to a predefined address and port. The class uses JSON serialization for event data and employs logging for debugging and error reporting.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Represents an event with a type, timestamp, and the ability to send itself over UDP

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event type

methods.name: getEventType
methods.description: Returns the type of the event

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.description: Generates and returns the current timestamp as a string

methods.name: send
methods.description: Serializes the event to JSON and sends it as a UDP packet to localhost on port 8711
